title: Fawad, Farrukh grieved over APP journalist’s demise in traffic accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 1 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain and Minister of State Farrukh Habib Saturday expressed grief and sorrow over the demise of Associated Press of Pakistan’s (APP) senior journalist Fawad Azam in a traffic accident in Lahore.
In their separate condolence messages, they sympathized with the family of Fawad Azam and said journalistic services of the deceased would be remembered for long.
They prayed to Almighty Allah to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to members of the bereaved family to bear this irreparable loss with equanimity.
Separately, Secretary Ministry of Information and Broadcasting/ Chairperson Board of Directors APP Shahera Shahid and Managing  Director Associated Press of Pakistan (APP) Mobashir Hasan also expressed their deep grief and sorrow over the death of senior reporter.
They expressed their sympathies with the bereaved family and prayed for the high ranks of the departed soul.
